content.rendered:
AC/DC Converter to Supply PS2-200 Pump Systems with Backup Power from a Generator or Mains Supply

Features:

  • AC input: 120/240 V (±15 %) as factory setting, 50 to 60 Hz
  • DC output: max. 48 V DC (no load), 450 W
  • Enclosure: steel, gasket-sealed, indoor-use, hinged front cover with key-lock
  • Must be protected from direct mid-day sun
  • Enclosure class: IP22
  • Ambient temperature: max. 45 °C / 113°F
  • PV cable length 2 m, with MC4 plugs
  • Main supply AC input cable length 1.8 m, pre-connected grid main supply plugs
  • Manual with further information is available on partnerNET
  • Meets the requirements for CE
